ing: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1/2 cup carbonated water, or as needed
des: "Trial and error pay off! Time-consuming, but so worth it."
ins: Put 3 mint leaves and 2 teaspoons sugar into each of 2 glass tumblers; vigorously stir sugar and mint together, crushing mint with the back of a spoon to release oils. Add 3 lime wedges to each glass; again stir vigorously to release some lime juice. Pour 1 jigger rum into each glass. Fill glasses with ice cubes and top with carbonated water; stir.
